enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve generating dates relative to the current time, with similar logic for time manipulation.
The 'between' method generates dates between two specified dates, which can be used to set up boundary conditions for testing the 'future' method.
The 'formatInstant' method converts a TemporalAccessor to a string, which can be used to assert the formatted output of the 'future' method.
The 'between' method can be used to validate that the generated future date falls within the expected range.
